other: Critical Skills Masters Program Fellowship - Sponsored by Sandia National Laboratories

thesis.title: Determining Integrated Lens Antenna Far-Field Patterns Using Geometrical Optics and the Aperture Field
thesis.summary: Outlines a method for determining the far-field radiation pattern of an electrically large integrated lens antenna. Rays are traced from the phase center of an antenna aperture, refracted from the lens boundary, and then sampled on a plane in front of the lens. The far-field is then computed using a near-field to far-field transformation from fields on this plane. The results are compared with time-domain simulations in CST Microwave Studio.

degree: BS with High Honors in Electrical Engineering
